title: Afropop
subtitle: Afropop x Afrobeat  x Reggae x Dancehall

text.text: Juls x Fireboy DML, Omah Lay, The Cavemen, PaBrymo x Teni, Koffi Olomide x Teni, Tekno x Mafikizolo, Skip Marley x Popcaan, Juls x Twich 4EVA x Quamina MP, Crayon x Bella Shmurda, Krizbeat x Tekno x Harmonize x DJ +Tira, Juls x Niniola, Fireboy DML x Wande Coal, Yung L, Omah Lay, Simi, Buju Banton x Pharell Williams, Burna Boy, Muzi, Lass x Kazy Lambist, Amaarae x Kali Uchis x Moliy, Thutmose x Bankulli, Burna boy x Wizkid, Wizkid x H.E.R., Bawo, Loski x Stormzy, Adekunle Gold  x Patoranking, Yung L x R2Bees; Sholazeal x Yung L, Rema, Drake x Tems, Olamide, Blaqnonez, Yemi Alade, Ruger, Ayra Starr, Buju, CKay, Mister Kay x Egar Boi, Tresor & ++++ Enjoy
